title.rendered: Brookdale Senior Living names Rick Wigginton as Senior Vice President, Sales

content.rendered:
Chartwell Partners is pleased to announce that Rick Wigginton has recently joined Brookdale Senior Living as Senior Vice President, Sales. Prior to joining Brookdale Senior Living, Mr. Wigginton served as Senior Vice President, Sales & Marketing for Holiday Retirement.

 

Brookdale Senior Living Inc. is the leading operator of senior living communities throughout the United States. The Company is committed to providing senior living solutions primarily within properties that are designed, purpose-built and operated to provide the highest-quality service, care and living accommodations for residents. Brookdale operates independent living, assisted living, and dementia-care communities and continuing care retirement centers, with approximately 961 communities in 46 states and the ability to serve approximately 93,000 residents as of September 30, 2018.
